text: Mbe maaŋ wari ga nzuaim, Pita mbaram mba Zisas farasegi 12 thɨgi ŋaara gumgi rɨgar khavgia thɨgap, kama havharan kaav khaŋ mba gumgi gum mbigi ga nzuai, “Nde kha Zudaiŋ gum nde mbe zegap kha Zerusareman ki gumgi gu mbigi, nde khuarar na bunin tɨgɨri. Nde khuaran na bunin tɨgɨp, nde ntige khar hi bigeŋ nɨɨeŋ kaŋgirga.
